arabic_text: لَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا فِيهِ ذِكۡرُكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ
translation: We have sent down to you [O people] a Book in which there is honor for you[5]. Do you not then understand?
footnotes: [5] As you have been mentioned and addressed in the Qur’an, or there is a reminder for you in it.
